guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"eflhp","text":"Thawing procedure is described for one cryovial. The protocol description is general and applies to multiple hPSC lines frozen as clumps or single cells. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ee2b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7r1i1","text":"It is recommended to thaw hPSC in same culture conditions that were used before freezing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"aocjt","text":"LABORATORY EQUIPMENT AND CONSUMABLES","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":36}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ahf4a","text":"Use sterile material","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9iruf","text":"2/5/10 mL pipettes ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cgq24","text":"15/50 mL conical tubes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2rt4o","text":"10/200/1000µL tips and pipettes (optional)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6lal","text":"Cell culture treated plastic vessels of choice e.g. 24, 12 or 6-well plates","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"erf79","text":"Cell counting equipment","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a5ola","text":"Aspirator pump with disposable pipette","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dpkro","text":"Centrifuge","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e3f77","text":"Microscope","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"drj1d","text":"Water/bead warming bath","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a3om1","text":"Class II Biosafety Cabinet","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bfla9","text":"Incubator at 37oC and 5% CO2  or under hypoxic conditions,  5% O2/ 5% CO2","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":15,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":27,"length":3},{"style":"sub","offset":64,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":72,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6qimi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d4t0c","text":"MEDIA AND REAGENTS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fdis8","text":"hPSC culture conditions and survival factors choice depend on hPSC line and individual lab practices. For options refer to protocols:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6289k","text":"Coating of tissue Culture Vessels for hPSC","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":42}],"data":{}},{"key":"igme","text":"Maintenance of hPSC","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":19}],"data":{}},{"key":"cec65","text":"Survival factors for hPSC growth","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":32}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6AB6D96269C0476E8A75817690D79A10","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/coating-of-tissue-culture-vessels-for-hpsc-mainten-c5a2y2ge"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"E98FADBF8CF34B31B5D2D695913B1ADA","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/maintenance-of-hpsc-c434yyqw"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"FDE1D2408A074F6ABDFF4D8B0AE3AC19","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/survival-factors-for-hpsc-growth-d5h58386"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5ifse","text":"Remove cryovial containing frozen hPSC from liquid N2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":52,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6olss","text":"Using 2 mL pipette transfer slowly hPSC suspension from the cryovial to a 15 mL conical tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f49r7","text":"Dropwise add   of culture media supplemented with survival factors to hPSC suspension while gently swirling the tube, refer to Table 1 for recommended volumes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":127,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5hbor","text":"Using a 5 mL pipette gently add   of hPSC culture medium supplemented with survival factors to the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"er8bl","text":"Seed hPSC at desired density according to well size/surface.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8gq3a","text":"Rock the plate side to side, back and forth to spread the cells across the well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d8i6n","text":"After  , perform full media change with respective hPSC maintenance media without survival factors.  For further hPSC culture refer to protocol Maintenance of hPSC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":6,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":144,"length":19}],"data":{}},{"key":"34br9","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ea0b7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"B225E509F38B11EF975D0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"9C2D3A3BA22E49EC9A7659A77E8B6BA7","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/maintenance-of-hpsc-c434yyqw"}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8q4e7","text":"hPSC display different morphology when cultured in medium containing survival factors. This morphology will change after media is replaced with medium without survival factors. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":57,"offset":43}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"au89t","text":"For detailed morphology, refer to protocol Reference pictures of hPSC cultured in defined conditions","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"guid":"D41476748E1D41059DBBA29DEAD8B47B","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/reference-pictures-of-hpsc-cultured-in-defined-con-c5c5y2y6"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"link"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"42mvt","text":"Thaw hPSC suspension at   using water or bead bath for about   -  leaving small amount of un-thawed media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":61,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":64,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9vbbr","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2jdo7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"1A68DA37F38D11EF821F0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":240,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1k6rc","text":"If using water bath, carefully swirl vial in the water, avoid immersing the vial above the level of the cap. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5274o","text":"Aspirate and remove the supernatant without disrupting the cell pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"crgpm","text":"Gently resuspend the hPSC pellet by pipetting up and down. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"atu2c","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"95itv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"b1rgq","text":"After homogeneous re-suspension and if hPSC were frozen as single cells, cell counting and viability assessment using e.g. Trypan Blue 0.4%. solution can be performed.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4t540","text":"Prepare coated tissue culture vessels according to hPSC line requierements and desired format. For coating procedure refer to protocol Coating of tissue Culture Vessels for hPSC","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":135,"length":42}],"data":{}},{"key":"30mto","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8uo4u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"2EBBD74459C441BF83073A5177CC3716","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/coating-of-tissue-culture-vessels-for-hpsc-mainten-c5a2y2ge"}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"40haq","text":"It is recommended to thaw hPSC on the same matrix that was used before freezing.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"92n3g","text":"Prepare required volume of the reagents and media supplemented with survival factors according to Table 1.  Additionally prepare 10 mL of media for Step 8.
